column6: Na ɔwo wo dzin na enyimnyam nka
column7: Wɔ wo mbɔbɔrhu na wo nokwar ntsi."

column3: Hɔn Nyankopɔn no wɔ hen ndɛ yi?"

column2: "Hɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ sorsor: Dza ɔpɛ na ɔyɛ."

column3: naaso wonnsuo adze mu; Wɔwɔ anan
column4: naaso wɔnnantsew; Eso wonndua hɔn meneba mu nnkasa."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ hɔn no tse dɛ hɔnara; Nyew
column3: obiara a ɔtwer hɔn no so."

column4: twer EWURADZE; Ɔnoara nye hom mboa na hom kyɛm."

column3: hom ntwer EWURADZE: Ɔnoara nye hɔn mboa na hɔn kyɛm
column6: hom ntwer EWURADZE: Ɔnoara nye hom mboa na hom kyɛm."

column2: "EWURADZE adwen hɛn do; obehyira hɛn: Obehyira Israel ne fifo; Obehyira Aaron ne fifo."

column3: Ɔno a ɔyɛɛ sor na asaase."

column2: "Ɔsorsor yɛ EWURADZE no sorsor; Na asaase dze

column3: Nkyii so nnyɛ hɔn a wosian kɔ foofoo mu no a;"
yebehyira EWURADZE Ofi ndɛ dze kɔ yi
column4: na daapem. Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
